languages.text: "Они пытались, о да! Но Император защитил своего слугу". {n}Комиссар бесстрашно улыбается.{/n}
"They've tried, oh, how they've tried! But every time, the Emperor protected His servant." {n}The Commissar smiles fearlessly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Они пытались, о да! Но Император защитил своего слугу". {n}Комиссар бесстрашно улыбается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "They've tried, oh, how they've tried! But every time, the Emperor protected His servant." {n}The Commissar smiles fearlessly.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “他们打算要我的命。噢，他们可真是不遗余力！不过每一次，帝皇都保护了祂的仆人。”{n}政委毫无惧色地笑了起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "They've tried, oh, how they've tried! But every time, the Emperor protected His servant." {n}The Commissar smiles fearlessly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “他们打算要我的命。噢，他们可真是不遗余力！不过每一次，帝皇都保护了祂的仆人。”{n}政委毫无惧色地笑了起来。{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「それはもう、何度も殺されかけましたよ！しかし、皇帝が忠実な従僕を見捨てることはありません」{n}コミッサーは堂々と笑った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "They've tried, oh, how they've tried! But every time, the Emperor protected His servant." {n}The Commissar smiles fearlessly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それはもう、何度も殺されかけましたよ！しかし、皇帝が忠実な従僕を見捨てることはありません」{n}コミッサーは堂々と笑った。{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «Lo han intentado, ¡y muchas veces! Pero el Emperador ha protegido a Su sirviente en todas esas ocasiones». {n}El Comisario sonríe sin miedo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They've tried, oh, how they've tried! But every time, the Emperor protected His servant." {n}The Commissar smiles fearlessly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lo han intentado, ¡y muchas veces! Pero el Emperador ha protegido a Su sirviente en todas esas ocasiones». {n}El Comisario sonríe sin miedo.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "They've tried, oh, how they've tried! But every time, the Emperor protected His servant." {n}The Commissar smiles fearlessly.{/n}

languages.text: « Oh, je peux vous dire qu'ils ont essayé de me tuer, et plus d'une fois ! Mais l'Empereur a toujours protégé Son serviteur. » {n}Le sourire du commissaire est dénué de toute trace de peur.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They've tried, oh, how they've tried! But every time, the Emperor protected His servant." {n}The Commissar smiles fearlessly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Oh, je peux vous dire qu'ils ont essayé de me tuer, et plus d'une fois ! Mais l'Empereur a toujours protégé Son serviteur. » {n}Le sourire du commissaire est dénué de toute trace de peur.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Sie haben es versucht, oh, und wie sie es versucht haben! Aber der Imperator hat Seinen Diener jedes Mal beschützt." {n}Der Kommissar lächelt furchtlos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They've tried, oh, how they've tried! But every time, the Emperor protected His servant." {n}The Commissar smiles fearlessly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sie haben es versucht, oh, und wie sie es versucht haben! Aber der Imperator hat Seinen Diener jedes Mal beschützt." {n}Der Kommissar lächelt furchtlos.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Canımı almak için çok uğraştılar! Fakat İmparator, her seferinde bu hizmetkârını korudu." {n}Komiser korkusuzca gülümsüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They've tried, oh, how they've tried! But every time, the Emperor protected His servant." {n}The Commissar smiles fearlessly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bıkmadan usanmadan denediler! Fakat İmparator, hizmetkârını her seferinde korudu." {n}Komiser korkusuzca gülümsüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
